title: A new game mode  idea
body:
What's up guys! So, I just finished watching the Doom Bots video and it's pretty much the LoL shout casters versing the most insane bots with random moves/passives. If you're interested here it is https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i7YGtxF1iGU

Anyways it got me thinking of how awesome it would be if there was a game made that supported this a 5v5 on Summoners Rift or Howling Abyss with a random champion with four random moves and a random passive and ultimate. For exmaple a Gragas with Annie Q Ezreal W Shaco E and Garen ultimate for example. You would get some quite funny spell kits and see champions do the weirdest things. I think it would be so enjoyable and hilarious. Just a thought, let me know what you guys think!

replies.body: you could have a champion with full cc abilites which would be fun/op
